mapper.sql: c_id, c_user_id, c_user_name, c_client_ip, c_download_file_id, c_download_file_name, d_download_date, d_download_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_download_record (c_id, c_user_id, c_user_name, c_client_ip, c_download_file_id, c_download_file_name, d_download_date, d_download_time) values (#{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cClientIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cDownloadFileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cDownloadFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dDownloadDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dDownloadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_download_record
c_user_id = #{cUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_user_name = #{cUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_client_ip = #{cClientIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_download_file_id = #{cDownloadFileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_download_file_name = #{cDownloadFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
d_download_date = #{dDownloadDate,jdbcType=DATE},
d_download_time = #{dDownloadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_download_record set c_user_id = #{cUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_user_name = #{cUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_client_ip = #{cClientIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_download_file_id = #{cDownloadFileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_download_file_name = #{cDownloadFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_download_date = #{dDownloadDate,jdbcType=DATE}, d_download_time = #{dDownloadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_download_record (c_id, c_user_id, c_user_name, c_client_ip, c_download_file_id, c_download_file_name, d_download_date, d_download_time) values
(#{item.cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cClientIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cDownloadFileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cDownloadFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dDownloadDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.dDownloadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_download_record where d_download_date between #{beginDate} and #{endDate}

select file.c_file_name as c_download_file_name, file.n_size as n_size, count(*) as n_download_times from t_download_record record LEFT JOIN t_potentials_file file on (record.c_download_file_id = file.c_id) where d_download_time between #{beginDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY record.c_download_file_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC limit #{stratRow}, #{endRow}
